name: Happy Diet
overview: Happy Diet is a sort of a simulation game that allows the player to lose weight while he's playing using the Stepper Controller. The player at the beginning of the game enter his age, height & weight and after that he can choose the game mode. The game features 3 game modes: - Diet Story: Advance through a story helping the character with his own diet. This part is a simulation game with some mini games - Own Diet: Manage your own diet, entering a plan and following it. - Walking Mode: Putting your data in the own diet you can now walk in this 3d mode.
